messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the International Discount Offer-KSA.
What does the International Discount Offer-KSA provide?
Can you tell me about the International Discount Offer-KSA?
What are the benefits of the International Discount Offer-KSA?

The International Discount Offer-KSA allows you to call Saudi Arabia at a rate of Rs. 15.33 per 20 seconds. You get 10 free Telenor Bonus minutes with every call, up to 50 minutes a day. You can dial *222# to check your remaining bonus minutes.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the International Discount Offer-KSA.
How can I activate the International Discount Offer-KSA?
What is the activation process for the International Discount Offer-KSA?
How do I subscribe to the International Discount Offer-KSA?
To activate the International Discount Offer-KSA, dial *345*6#.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the International Discount Offer-KSA.
Who is eligible for the International Discount Offer-KSA?
Is the International Discount Offer-KSA available for all Telenor subscribers?
Can all Telenor subscribers use the International Discount Offer-KSA?
All Telenor subscribers are eligible for the International Discount Offer-KSA.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the International Discount Offer-KSA.
How long is the International Discount Offer-KSA valid for?
What is the validity of the International Discount Offer-KSA?
How many days can I use the International Discount Offer-KSA?
The International Discount Offer-KSA is valid 24 hours a day. The free Telenor Bonus minutes are valid until midnight of the same day.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the International Discount Offer-KSA.
Are there any additional conditions for the International Discount Offer-KSA?
What are the terms and conditions for the International Discount Offer-KSA?
Are there any extra charges or limitations with the International Discount Offer-KSA?
A call setup charge of 15 paisa will be applied to each call. All prices are inclusive of tax. The free Telenor minutes are valid until midnight of the same day.
